title: Funerary aedicola for Damatrios
support: Small, damaged 'pseudo-aedicola', of the coarse local stone, coated with stucco and painted; text incised.

layout.p: Incised and painted, one word per line within a recessed frame (H 14.5 cm x W 13.5 cm), stucco on stone.

provenanceFound._: Excavations 1974, via del Fante, adjoining Cooperativa S. Francesco
